name: Creamy Mushroom & Chicken Pasta
preparation: In Multipurpose or Round Steamer, add chicken in a single layer (itâ€™s OK if the fillets touch). Cover; cook on high 4 min.
Add noodles, milk, hot water, and seasoning; stir to mix. Microwave on high, uncovered, 5 min. Remove from microwave and stir; cook for an additional 3 min 30 sec.
Stir in peas. Microwave on high, uncovered, for 4 min or until pasta is tender and sauce has thickened.
tips: For a thicker sauce, let the dish rest 10 min before serving. The sauce will thicken as it sits.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 2 cups mixed greens and 1 tbsp Epicure dressing of your choice.
